author: Kenny Yap
text:
Everything is so clean and new. Limited parking at night but in the day it’s awesome to be able to park and just walk right across into the gym. Downside is the stretching area is relatively small and has no soft padding. Also doesn’t have some more commonly found equipments like kettlebells, stretch bands, wallballs, leg straps.

Upside is abundance of squat racks and deadlift platforms with a lot of 20kg plates. Full range of dumbbells up to 50kg. Cardio machines are the latest kind with big screens. There’s also 2 rowing machine although it’s not the same as the ones used at hyrox.

author: y y
text:
There are a variety of machines in this shop. and they were carefully arranged, making it easy to train.

The toilets and showers were located outside the store, just like in other stores across the country, but they were able to be used without any problems.

The staff were also very friendly.

I'll go again!

author: Lim Jie
text: There were good equipments in the gym. But contrary to what the anytime fitness app says, they do not have private showers, the only showers are the Campus showers. Thus, there is no hot water, soap and shampoo provided. Please remember to bring your own!

author: januce
text:
good variety of weights and equipments. BUT very rude staff(s), not just once but twice for calling people out loudly as others are enjoying their workouts. really kill the vibes and momentum.

try to understand that gymbros here are trying to clock our workouts and we have basic gym etiquettes that we will return the weights AFTER we finish the workout or even sharing with others.

saw how the staffs are walking around PATROLLING as though we are trying to do something with the equipments here.

author: D A
text: the gym environment at NTU is honestly amazing. there’s a great range of equipment, and i’ve always been able to find what i need for my workouts. one small suggestion would be to consider adding a few step boards as i find it challenging to place my feet firmly on the ground when doing chest press on the plate loaded machine. other than that, no complaints at all and the staff are friendly and approachable :)

author: yr0304
text: This is a great gym with excellent equipment! Although it doesn't have its own shower, I was able to use the shared showers right outside, so it wasn't a problem for me.

author: Elvin Chng
text:
Everything you expect of a brand-new gym, but I didn’t expect not having a private shower in the gym itself. The shower facility is shared with the stadium, which the condition is less than ideal.

Updates after the owners' reply.
I understand that there are building restrictions. You should remove Private Restrooms and Private Showers from your website under Gym Amenities.

author: Ron Ng
text: This gym is brand new and spotless! There’s a ton of different equipment to choose from. The staff are super friendly and helpful. I highly recommend it! It’s definitely a 5-star gym.

author: Yeo Yeo
text: My credit card was stolen, and I had to replace it with a new one. During this time, I wasn’t able to update my payment information right away. As a result, I was charged a late fee, even though the delay was due to circumstances beyond my control. I would have appreciated more understanding or at least a grace period. Disappointed with how this was handled.

author: Lutfil Haady
text:
One of the better AF with very diverse equipment. Plenty of racks(best part).

Personally as an NTU student, it is very convenient as I don’t have to travel far.

author: Luo Chao Jun
text: Very solid equipment. Just suggesting that adding an eleiko bar would cater better to the competitive lifters. Maybe add some extra step pads to cater to shorter people.

author: Poot Poot
text: Rmbr to put back ur weights here because the staff here take this very seriously and would call u out loudly like as if u committed a crime. Did not apologise when they call out by mistake too. Hope they can improve in their customer service…

author: Kenneth TIan
text: Nice gym, good equipment but maybe too many people at like 9-11pm

author: natasha binte mohamad ali (heynatasha27)
text: Very nice and clean!

author: Tran Quan
text: friendly environment

author: ぽんや今井（ぽんや）
text:
The layout, machine specs, and security are all well-organized.
A gym that is kept clean and motivating.

author: Neeraj Sharma
text:
Thank you, Neeraj, for the 4-star review! 
We are glad to hear you had a positive experience with AF NTU. 
Your feedback means a lot, and we will continue striving to make every experience even better. 
If you have any comments regarding the gym or our service, please do not hesitate to reach out to us. 
We hope to see you again soon!

author: ZER YEONG CHEE
text:
Hi Yeong Chee,

Thank you so much for the 5 star review. It really means a lot to us!

If there is anything we can do to improve your experience or support our members better, please do not hesitate to let us know.

author: Chenjie Huang
text:
Hi Chenjie,

Thank you so much for the 5 star review. It really means a lot to us!

If there is anything we can do to improve your experience or support our members better, please don’t hesitate to let us know.

author: 谢顿
text:
Dear 谢顿,
Thank you for taking the time to leave us a 5 Stars ! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us and we would love to have you back soon!
